name: self
myself
me
101.desc: Yourself. You seem to be doing pretty well.

name: shovel
10000.desc: A wooden-handled shovel. It seems like the kind a farmer would use.
10000.details: You turn it over. On the back of the handle you see '<3' & ':)' scratched into it. Probably by an 8 year old.

name: box
metal box
10001.details: It is closed, but the lid doesn't look too secure...just sayin'.

name: mat
welcome mat
10002.desc: A well-worn mat that has the word WELCOME on it.

name: key
10003.details: It has the words 'unlocks door' on it.

name: open box
box
metal box
10004.details: The lid is open. The box is empty. *sad trombone*

name: guitar pick
pick
10005.details: It appears to have a turtle printed on it with the words "Red Herring" underneath.

name: trophy
10006.desc: A golden trophy with a picture of a person playing video games on the top.

name: door
50000.desc: A sturdy-looking, locked door with a doorknob and a keyhole.

name: door
50001.desc: A sturdy looking door. It appears to be unlocked. Good job, you!

name: drawer
50002.desc: A fairly standard drawer. It is closed.

name: drawer
50003.desc: A fairly standard drawer. It is open.

name: desk
50004.desc: A lovely, antique desk with nothing on it. You notice a drawer at the front of the desk.

name: door
50005.desc: The door is swung open and you see the welcoming light of outside to the East.

name: doorknob
door knob
knob
50006.desc: A normal looking doorknob. You assume it turns clockwise as well as counter-clockwise.

name: keyhole
50007.desc: The keyhole is big enough to fit a key-shapped object into it. Leaning down, you look through it to see bright light on the other side.
